article.title: General Dynamics to Support Remote Re-Key Modernization
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: General Dynamics C4 Systems Inc., Needam, Mass., is being awarded a $9,286,309 firm-fixed-price contract to support the Remote Re-key Modernization Program. The contracting activity is the Air Force Life Cycle Management Center, Joint Base San Antonio-Lackland, Texas.
